activities.name: Tuk-Tuk Experience in Fort Kochi
activities.description_of_activity: Discover the hidden gems of Fort Kochi in a tuk–tuk with a locally-born tuk–tuk driver.
activities.activity_experience: During the tour you will explore Fortkochi and Mattanchery in a tuk–tuk with the help of local born tuck–tuk drivers who are the real experts of the local area.
activities.activity_features:
# Auto Rickshaw ride
# Local born tuck–tuk drivers
# Faster way to explore Kochi
# Tour covers all the landmarks
activities.experience_detailing:
1. Introducing the tuk-tuk driver to the guest
2. Visit to Chinese fishing nets
3. Visit to St Francis church
4. Visit to Santa Cruz Basilica
activities.package_inclusion: Visit to all the important landmarks in Kochi
activities.package_exclusion: The entry fee to the monuments
activities.cost_detailing: The charges for the experience is INR 2100.00 including taxes.
activities.billing_instruction: The charges will be added to the guest folio.
